channel.title: Need help with using npsdrops.cfg to make..npcdrops
channel.description:
i've seen so many tutorials on this. none of them bloody helped, i made a tztok-jad, and then i went into npcdrops.cfg, made this: npcdrop = 2745 5 6570 1 that, shoudl have made it drop a firecape. now, i looked at the dtrops for man, and figured this out: drop type /item 1. coins [coins] 2. iron dagger, bronze arrow, bolts [weapons] 3. bronze med helm, iron med helm [armour] 4. earth rune, law rune, fire rune, blood rune, chaos rune, mind rune [runes] 5. herb, leather boots, fishing bait, [other]
therefore, theoretically, drop type 5 for firecape should be correct, and yet all i seem to get for the drop it dwarf remains (wtf?) and bones.
[i'm using hybridscape as a base here, therefore no java files.] [when i play hybridscape, i've noticed no monsters drop anything other than dwarf remains]
help greatly appreciated.

item.title: Need help with using npsdrops.cfg to make..npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

wow well u mean the client one wow that thing is kinda lame u would be really better off with a custom client form one of the many programers on this site check the download section for clients and servers and if u need any help or tut info feal free to pm me i got nothing better to do with my time then program and help so im open for questions
note: custom clients and server are way better and custom clients have better stability and functionality.

item.title: Need help with using npsdrops.cfg to make..npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @crysis_touch crysis touch
item.description:
@crysis_touch wrote:

i’ve seen so many tutorials on this. none of them bloody helped, i made a tztok-jad, and then i went into npcdrops.cfg, made this:
npcdrop = 2745 5 6570 1
that, shoudl have made it drop a firecape.
now, i looked at the dtrops for man, and figured this out:
drop type /item

  1. coins [coins]
  2. iron dagger, bronze arrow, bolts [weapons]
  3. bronze med helm, iron med helm [armour]
  4. earth rune, law rune, fire rune, blood rune, chaos rune, mind rune [runes]
  5. herb, leather boots, fishing bait, [other]

therefore, theoretically, drop type 5 for firecape should be correct, and yet all i seem to get for the drop it dwarf remains (wtf?) and bones.

[i’m using hybridscape as a base here, therefore no java files.]
[when i play hybridscape, i’ve noticed no monsters drop anything other than dwarf remains]

help greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with using npsdrops.cfg to make..npcdrops
